model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The main logic class; this is the entry point for creating a single game
    Author:
    jsnhlbr5

        public Game(int players)
        Creates a new game with the given number of players, using the default names
        Parameters:

      • Game

        public Game(int players,
            java.lang.String[] names)
        Creates a new game with the given number of players, using the given names
        Parameters:
        players - the number of players (2-4)
        names - the names to use for each player

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs a single game and exits. The number of players can be set using the first command line argument, the default is 2.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean b)
        Sets the visibility of all the generated windows
        Parameters:
        b - true to set them visible

      • getFactoryCount

        the number of factories for this game

      • getFactoryTiles

        public TileCollection getFactoryTiles(int i)
        Returns a TileCollection representing the specified factory's tiles
        Parameters:
        i - the factory for which tiles are being requested
        Returns:
        a TileCollection representing the specified factory's tiles

      • getCenterTiles

        public TileCollection getCenterTiles()

      • getCurPlayer

        public int getCurPlayer()
        Returns the player whose turn it is
        Returns:
        the player whose turn it is

      • pickTilesFromFactory

        public void pickTilesFromFactory(int factory,
                                 Color c)
        Selects tiles from the given factory of the given color. The selected tiles are transfered to the current player's selected tiles buffer, and the remainder are transfered to the center area.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to select tiles from
        c - the color of tiles to select

      • pickTilesFromCenter

        public void pickTilesFromCenter(Color c)
        Selects tiles from the center area of the given color. If the white tile is present, it is added to the selected tiles before they are transfered to the current player's selected tiles buffer.
        Parameters:
        c - the color of tiles to select

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Ends a player's turn. If the round is over (all tiles have been picked), performs end-of-round activities (tiling, scoring, and discard). If the game is not over, resets the common area for the next round; otherwise tallies final bonuses and declares the winner before exiting.

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(GameObserver o)

      • resetCenter

        private void resetCenter()
        Sets up the common area for the beginning of a round.

      • roundOver

        private boolean roundOver()
        Returns true if the round is over (all tiles have been drawn)
        Returns:
        true if the round is over (all tiles have been drawn)

      • gameOver

        private boolean gameOver()
        Returns true if the game is over (at least one player has at least one completed row)
        Returns:
        true if the game is over (at least one player has at least one completed row)

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of all player windows and the common area window (resulting in the application exiting if run from the above main method)
